void Flora::activate (  ) 

void Flora::createUnmanagedObjects (  )  [virtual]

This method implements the Moo::DeviceCallback interface for creating DX resources not managed by DX.

Here we create our vertex buffer and shaders.

Reimplemented from Moo::DeviceCallback.

DataSectionPtr Flora::data (  )  [inline]

void Flora::deactivate (  ) 

void Flora::deleteUnmanagedObjects (  )  [virtual]

This method implements the Moo::DeviceCallback interface for deleting DX resources that were created by createUnmanagedObjects.

Reimplemented from Moo::DeviceCallback.

void Flora::draw ( float  dTime,
class EnviroMinder &  enviro 
)

This method draws the flora.

There are a number of ways to do this. This particular implementation just draws the whole damn VB ( 20,000 polys or so )

void Flora::drawDebug (  ) 

void Flora::drawShadows ( ShadowCasterPtr  pShadowCaster  ) 

Ecotype & Flora::ecotypeAt ( const Vector2 &  p  ) 

This method returns the ecotype for the given position.

This method never returns NULL if there is no terrain block, or if there is no ecotype definition for the detailID in the Flora dataSection. In these cases, the degenerate ecotype is returned ( which just creates degenerate triangles )

int Flora::getTerrainBlockID ( const Matrix &  terrainBlockTransform  )  const

This method allocates a drawID.

bool Flora::init ( DataSectionPtr  pSection,
uint32  terrainVersion 
)

This method initialises the flora singleton, and should be called once at startup.

Note : flora data section is "flora/flora.xml"

Parameters:
pSection The flora data section.
terrainVersion The terrain version specified for this space.

This method initialises the offsets_ array with vector2s inside a circle of BLOCKWIDTH/2 radius.

void Flora::seedOffsetTable ( const Vector2 &  center  ) 

This method sets the index into the offsets_ array given a world position.

It is hoped that each world position gives a different seed.

void Flora::update ( float  dTime,
class EnviroMinder &  enviro 
)

This method updates the flora blocks ( moves them given the new position of the camera ), and updates the animation grid to suit.

Parameters:
dTime The change in time since the last frame.
enviro Unused parameter.

uint32 Flora::vbSize (  )  const [inline]

void Flora::vbSize ( uint32  numBytes  ) 

This method sets the number of vertices used by the flora and reinitialises all dependencies.

Can be called at runtime to change the flora detail level.
